title: Fado ao Centro
description:
Fado ao CentroÃ‚Â® is a Cultural Center committed to promote Fado from Coimbra, with daily LIVE concerts at 6:00 pm.

A magical space with a unique atmosphere were you can find the most genuine and traditional Fado from Coimbra everyday from 10:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m.

Only the best musicians of the city play in Fado ao Centro and they are selected according to the highest standards of this 160 year old tradition.

Even if you canÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t witness the concert, donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t miss the oportunity to visit our space and get to know a little bit more about Fado from Coimbra. There are always musicians playing and rehearsing so you can change experiences and learn more about the Portuguese Guitar and this unique musical tradition.

Bewtween 4:00 p.m. and 5:30 p.m. we have the Ã¢â‚¬Å“Afternoon RehearsalsÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ with our regular musicians. You can always pass by, watch them play and anyone that wantÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s to bring their own instrument is also welcome to join!

At 6:00 p.m. we start our daily 50 minute long concert of Fado from Coimbra. If you are interested in attending our concert, we strongly advise you to make a reservation in order to ensure your seat.

We donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t serve any kind of food, so we are totally committed to the concert itself, enabling a genuine atmosphere and unique cultural and musical experience in Coimbra!

Following the work that has been held by this Cultural Association, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll find different exclusive editions of books, CDs and DVDs related to Fado from Coimbra. Fado ao CentroÃ‚Â® is, undoubtedly, a place to visit in Coimbra!
